Shanti Mantra.sanskrit:
ॐ द्यौः शान्तिरन्तरिक्षं शान्तिः।
पृथिवी शान्तिरापः शान्तिरोषधयः शान्तिः॥
Shanti Mantra.transliteration:
Om Dyauḥ Shāntir Antarikṣaṁ Shāntiḥ,
Pṛthivī Shāntir Āpaḥ Shāntir Oṣadhayaḥ Shāntiḥ.
Shanti Mantra.english: May there be peace in the heavens, peace in the sky, peace on earth, peace in the waters, peace in the plants.

Asato Ma Sadgamaya.sanskrit: असतो मा सद्गमय। तमसो मा ज्योतिर्गमय। मृत्योर्मा अमृतं गमय॥
Asato Ma Sadgamaya.transliteration: Asato Mā Sad Gamaya, Tamaso Mā Jyotir Gamaya, Mṛtyor Mā Amṛtaṁ Gamaya.
Asato Ma Sadgamaya.english: Lead me from the unreal to the real, from darkness to light, from death to immortality.

Lokah Samastah Sukhino Bhavantu.english: May all beings in all worlds be happy and free.
